an10.111:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.111:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.111:5.3: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu asekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāsaṅkappena samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāvācāya samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammākammantena samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāājīvena samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāvāyāmena samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāsatiyā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāsamādhinā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāñāṇena samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāvimuttiyā samannāgato hoti.
an10.111:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu asekho hotī”ti.
